synopsis.text:
Death-defying duels, political intrigue, and an unexpected romance await at Tokyo Beatrice University Attached High School, where the mysterious power of Beatrice brings magic into the real world. Enter Yoshimura Mamoru, a freshman who was once saved by this very power as a child. On his first day, he encounters the beautiful and formidable Takasu Ayako, a second-year student and granddaughter of a powerful politician, known as the Witch Beatrice or Angel of Death. Despite her fearsome reputation, Ayako surprises Mamoru with a sudden confession of love.

As Mamoru navigates the challenges of his new school, he must also confront the dangers that come with being close to Ayako. With the ability to shoot down satellites and fend off foreign adversaries, Ayako is a force to be reckoned with. But beneath her intimidating exterior lies a pure-hearted girl, and Mamoru must decide if he can rise to the occasion and stand by her side. Will his own powers ever measure up, or will the perils of the Beatrice world prove too much to handle? Only time will tell in this thrilling and heartwarming tale of love and magic.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
